r.d: yac is a fast, lock-free, shared memory user data cache for PHP. it can be used to replace APC or local memcached.
r.n: - Implemnented CAS based lock-free protection - Use SSE4.2 _mm_crc32 instead of normal crc32 to make speedup - Some optimization to avoding memory usage - Fixed PECL package (missed yac_atomic.h)
